metadata.inclusion:
1. Hold the button for 7 seconds until the status light turns amber, then release
2. Tap the top of the paddle one time
3. The status light will quickly flash green
metadata.exclusion:
1. Hold the button for 7 seconds until the status light turns amber, then release
2. Tap the top of the paddle one time
3. The status light will quickly flash green
metadata.reset: Hold the top of the paddle for 14 seconds. The status light will quickly flash red/amber.
